page.title: 01AROUND DITTON PRIORS.
page.content: {Ditton Priors}is set in the beautiful county of{Shropshire}near the{Welsh borders.Sheltered by the towering {Brown Clee Hill}it a wonderful village to visit.The nearest landmark is{ {Bridgnorth,}9 miles from the village. Our community is built up of agricultural landscape.The majority of farming is hill farming where the {Brown Clee}feeds sheep and other animals.Stroll through the woods or have a picnic it is your choice.The village has much {history}behind it with a{12th}century church to admire or a {1940 Depot.}The friendly people will direct you to any of the historical sites and there are two shops to refresh you,a garage for your car, and the{Howard Arms}for a meal or a drink. 900 years ago the Normans came to Dodintun,it is now Ditton Priors.
